channel.title: amazon on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in amazon on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-09
item.description: The 7 biggest announcements from Apple’s Peek Performance event (3 minute read) Apple announced a new version of the iPhone SE, a new desktop Mac, an external monitor, and more at its Peek Performance event.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-09
item.description: Apple announces a way to buy stuff by tapping iPhones together (2 minute read) Apple is releasing a new Tap to Pay feature for the iPhone that allows people to receive payments.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-21
item.description: First details leak on Project Iris, Google’s next AR headset (3 minute read) Google is developing a new augmented reality headset that it plans to ship sometime in 2024.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-10
item.description: Google launches Ripple, an open standard that could bring tiny radars to Ford cars and more (3 minute read) Google has launched an open-source API standard called Ripple.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-27
item.description: Uber jumps into Europe’s rapid grocery delivery market with 15-minute service in Paris (3 minute read) Uber and Carrefour have created a service in Paris that ships essential items to customers in as little as 15 minutes.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-06
item.description: Amazon is reportedly working on a smart fridge (2 minute read) Project Pulse is a smart fridge being developed at Amazon that will be able to track inventory and purchase habits, predict what customers need, and have those products delivered.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-05
item.description: Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, and Oculus are down. Here’s what we know (2 minute read) Facebook and all of its services went down today.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-29
item.description: Here’s everything Amazon just announced: A home robot named Astro, a fitness band and more (6 minute read) Amazon just announced a bunch of new gadgets ahead of the busy holiday shopping season.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-15
item.description: Here’s everything Apple announced at its iPhone 13 event (3 minute read) Apple has unveiled its latest line of hardware releases at its California Streaming event.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-07
item.description: Amazon is reportedly planning to release an Amazon-branded TV as soon as October (1 minute read) Amazon is planning to release Amazon-branded TVs as soon as October in the US.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-01
item.description: South Korea law forces Google and Apple to open up app store payments (3 minute read) Apple and Google are battling lawsuits and regulators around the world due to their app store rules.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-15
item.description: Amazon bought Facebook’s satellite team to help build its Starlink competitor (3 minute read) Amazon has purchased Facebook’s small-satellite division.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-06
item.description: Andy Jassy officially takes over as Amazon CEO from Jeff Bezos (3 minute read) Jeff Bezos has stepped down as CEO of Amazon and is now the Executive Chair.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-22
item.description: Apple Developing a Whole New Kind of MacBook Air (2 minute read) Apple is working on a new high-end MacBook Air.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-16
item.description: Windows 11 leak reveals new UI, Start menu, and more (3 minute read) An early version of Windows 11 has leaked online ahead of its unveiling on June 24.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-13
item.description: Elon Musk says Tesla will stop accepting bitcoin for car purchases, citing environmental concerns (3 minute read) Tesla has suspended vehicle purchases using bitcoin due to concerns over the increasing use of fossil fuels for bitcoin mining.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-18
item.description: Amazon is expanding Amazon Care telehealth service nationally for its employees and other companies (3 minute read) Amazon Care is rolling out for Amazon employees in all 50 states starting this summer.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-03
item.description: Amazon will have a new CEO as Jeff Bezos transitions to executive chair later this year (2 minute read) Jeff Bezos will step down as CEO and become the executive chair of the Amazon board in Q3 2021.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-11
item.description: Apple, Hyundai set to agree electric car tie-up (2 minute read) Hyundai Motor and Apple Inc are planning to sign a partnership deal on autonomous electric cars by March.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-27
item.description: Salesforce is in talks to buy Slack, deal could be announced next week (2 minute read) Slack shares closed almost 38% higher on Wednesday after it was reported that Salesforce was in talks to acquire the company.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-18
item.description: Amazon jumps into the pharmacy business with online prescription fulfillment, free delivery for Prime members (6 minute read) Amazon Pharmacy has launched in the US.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-30
item.description: Amazon jumps into virtual tourism, offering live one-on-one experiences around the world (5 minute read) Amazon Explore is Amazon’s new tech platform and marketplace that offers access to live virtual experiences with people from around the world.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-22
item.description: Microsoft purchases Bethesda Softworks in industry-changing acquisition (3 minute read) Microsoft has announced that it is buying the corporate parents of Bethesda Softworks, ZeniMax Media.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-18
item.description: Amazon Fresh grocery store in Los Angeles opens to the public (1 minute read) Amazon Fresh at Woodland Hills, Los Angeles is now open to the public from 7 AM to 10 PM PT daily.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-02
item.description: Dating app Bumble preparing for an IPO above $6 billion (1 minute read) Bumble is preparing for an Initial Public Offering early next year, possibly seeking a valuation of between $6 billion to $8 billion.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-01
item.description: Amazon’s Prime Air can officially begin drone delivery trials in the US (2 minute read) Amazon has officially become an air carrier, with the Federal Aviation Administration granting Amazon Prime Air approval to begin its first commercial delivery trials in the US.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-28
item.description: TikTok CEO Kevin Mayer to leave the company (4 minute read) TikTok CEO Kevin Mayer has resigned from the company just months after his appointment.
